entity.name: transfer
entity.query: SELECT transfers.id AS id, transfers.call_number AS call_number, transfers.transfer_date AS transfer_date, transfers.preservation_master_id AS preservation_master_id, transfers.vendor_id AS vendor_id, vendors.name AS vendor_name, transfers.engineer_id AS engineer_id, users.first_name AS engineer_first_name, users.last_name AS engineer_last_name, cuts.id AS cut_id, cuts.title AS cut_title, cuts.performer_composer AS cut_performer_composer, items.collection_id AS collection_id, collections.name AS collection_name, items.format_id AS format_id, formats.name AS format_name, types.id AS type_id, TRIM(TRAILING 'Transfer' FROM transfers.subclass_type) AS type_name, transfers.created_at AS created_at, transfers.updated_at AS updated_at FROM transfers LEFT JOIN audio_visual_items AS items ON transfers.call_number = items.call_number LEFT JOIN collections ON items.collection_id = collections.id LEFT JOIN vendors ON transfers.vendor_id = vendors.id LEFT JOIN formats ON items.format_id = formats.id LEFT JOIN users ON transfers.engineer_id = users.id LEFT JOIN cuts ON transfers.id = cuts.transfer_id LEFT JOIN media_types AS types ON TRIM(TRAILING 'Transfer' FROM transfers.subclass_type) = types.name WHERE transfers.deleted_at is null;
